title: Kalsubai Sunrise Sp. Night Trek
location: Bari Village, Tal Akole Dis. Ahilyanagar
details: Kalsubai Peak Trek with a height of 1646 meters or 5400 Feet is famous as the highest peak in Maharashtra. Kalsubai Mountain lies in the Sahyadri mountain range falling under Kalsubai Harishchandragad Wildlife Sanctuary

events.description: Meet TB leader at 1st Pick up point Bank of Maharashtra Shivaji Nagar
Reach Top of the Peak and Enjoy Beautiful Cloud formation at Peak and Enjoy Scenic View of Sahyadri
Reach Pune / Mumbai with lots of Memories (Tentatively)

costInclude.item: Travelling by Non AC private bus

thingsToCarry.item: Full pants and full sleeves t-shirts to protect from tanning, thorns, insects during the trek
Snacks (Energy bars, Chikki, Biscuits, Sprouts, Chips, Dry fruits)

pune.location: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj bus stop (Shivajinagar Pune) In front of Bank of Maharashtra

faqs.question: Is this trek safe for girls?
faqs.answer: This trek is completely safe for girls. We have girl volunteers specially appointed for girls. And have separate changing rooms.

faqs.question: How many trek leaders will be available?
faqs.answer: There will be 01 trek leader available for a group of 8 people in each trek.

faqs.question: How do I get in touch with trek leaders and trek groups ?
faqs.answer: We add participants in our Whatsapp group one day prior to the event.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my booking?
faqs.answer: You can check our cancel policy for the same. Or you can join us on the next trek (please inform us before 2 days)

faqs.question: What is prohibited in this trek?
faqs.answer: Smoking, Drinking and undesclipined behaviour is prohibited

faqs.question: Are changing rooms provided?
faqs.answer: Yes, separate (Male/Female) changing rooms are provided.

faqs.question: What is the type of bus ?
faqs.answer: The bus is NON/AC Tempo Traveler with decent seating comfort.

faqs.question: Are washrooms available on the trek?
faqs.answer: Washrooms are available at the base village only. No facility is available during the trek.

faqs.question: Pick up points
faqs.answer: Pick up is available if your location comes in between our route for this you have to contact us before.

title: Velas Turtle Festival
location: Velas Beach, Tal. Mandangad Dis. Ratnagiri
details: In the year 2000-01, it was found that a species of turtle, Olive Ridley is a prominent visitor to the shores of Maharashtra for breeding purposes. Other species are the Green Turtle, Hawksbill and the Leatherback. A lot of the other information

itinerary.description: Saturday Night Leave from Pune 09.00 pm Pickup First pickup 01 : Shivaji Nagar Infront of Maharashtra Bank Second Pickup 02 : Chandni chowk
09:00 PM Reach Home with Loads of Memories

costInclude.item: Travelling by Non AC private bus
Authentic Konkani Meals at Velas (Breakfast & Lunch)
Velas Turtle sightings by early morning

Snacks (Energy bars, Chikki, Biscuits, Sprouts, Chips, Dry fruits)
Please carry a  Jacket & cover your phones also in a plastic cover

title: Harishchandragad Monsoon Sp. Trek
location: Pachnai Village Tal. Akole Dis. Ahilyanagar
details:
Harischandragad Fort is one of the best hill forts in the Ahmednagar region. It's a very popular trekking destination due to the amazing views that one can get from the top.
The main attraction at Harishchandragad is the Konkan Kada from where you get a nice view of Konkan. The structure of this kada is like an overhang and during the monsoon season, clouds get clustered under this kada. The view is just spectacular.
In short, Harischandragad trek has a lot to offer. So if you've not been here, do plan for it. It's a must visit place.

events.description: Meet TB leader at 1st Pick up point Bank of Maharashtra Shivaji Nagar
Reach Top of the Fort and Enjoy Beautiful Cloud formation at Fort and Enjoy Scenic View of Sahyadri
Enjoy Beautiful Kokankada, Kedareshwar temple & Explore View
Reach Pune / Mumbai with lots of Memories (Tentatively)

location: Shewate Village, Tal. Mahad, Dis. Raigad
details: Nanemachi waterfalls is a natural attraction inside a dense forest. You can feel the extraordinary energy of reaching this beautiful waterfall. The place is famous for its blue water that flows inside the waterfall. It has a depth of about 400 feet and is well hidden
